Class CcddCommandLineHandler

CCDD.CcddCommandLineHandler

  • Constructor Details

    • CcddCommandLineHandler

      CcddCommandLineHandler(CcddMain ccddMain, String[] args)
      Command line argument handler class constructor
      Parameters:
      ccddMain - Main class reference
      args - Array of command line arguments and associated parameters

  • Method Details

    • parseCommand

      protected void parseCommand(CcddConstants.CommandLinePriority priority)
      Parse and execute the main command line argument(s). The application exits if the shutdown command is present and all command line commands have completed execution
      Parameters:
      priority - Command priority range - execute only those commands with a priority >= to the start value (-1 to start with the lowest priority command) and <= to the end value (-1 to end with the highest priority command)

    • parseCommand

      private void parseCommand(int startPriority, int endPriority, String[] cmdLnArgs, List<CcddCommandLineHandler.CommandHandler> commandArgument)
      Parse and execute the command line argument(s)
      Parameters:
      startPriority - Command priority boundary - ignore commands with a priority less than this value; -1 starts with the lowest priority command
      endPriority - Command priority boundary - ignore commands with a priority greater than this value; -1 ends with the highest priority command
      cmdLnArgs - Array of command line arguments to parse
      commandArgument - List of valid command line commands

    • postCommandCleanUp

      protected void postCommandCleanUp(int exitStatus)
      Perform any clean-up steps following command line argument execution or failure
      Parameters:
      exitStatus - 0 if all commands executed successfully; 1 if an error occurred

    • displayUsageInformation

      private void displayUsageInformation()
      Display the command usage information

    • handleSize

      private Dimension handleSize(String arg, String parm, Object[] min) throws Exception
      Get the main window size parameter
      Parameters:
      arg - Window size command line argument
      parm - Window dimensions
      min - Array containing the minimum main window width and minimum main window height
      Returns:
      Main window dimension value (null if an error is found)
      Throws:
      Exception - If the width or height value is not a number or a value is missing

    • handleMinMax

      private Integer handleMinMax(String arg, String parm, Object[] limit) throws Exception
      Get an integer value parameter that has minimum and maximum limits
      Parameters:
      arg - Integer value command line argument
      parm - Integer value
      limit - Array containing the lower limit value (inclusive) and the upper limit value (inclusive)
      Returns:
      Integer value (null if an error is found)
      Throws:
      Exception - If the minimum or maximum value is not a number

    • handleColor

      private Integer handleColor(String arg, String parm) throws Exception
      Get a color parameter
      Parameters:
      arg - Color command line argument
      parm - Color in hexadecimal format or a color name
      Returns:
      Selected color in hexadecimal format (null if an error is found)
      Throws:
      Exception - If the color value is not in the expected hexadecimal format or is not a recognized color name

    • handleOption

      private Object handleOption(String arg, String parm, String[] inputOptions, Object[] outputValues) throws Exception
      Get the selected option which must match one of a predefined list of options. The command argument if forced to lower case when comparing to the acceptable options
      Parameters:
      arg - Command line argument
      parm - Command option
      inputOptions - Array of valid inputs
      outputValues - Array of output values associated with each input option
      Returns:
      Output value for the option selected
      Throws:
      Exception - If the supplied value is not one of those in the predefined list
